6872.quoteText:
When you use our Services, We may collect and store information automatically about your device and your use of the Services via cookies, web beacons and other similar technologies.
This allows us to measure the performance of tasks you configure on our Platform, and to provide analytics information and guarantee the correct functioning of our Services.
6872.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

6873.quoteDoc: Unsubscribe and delete my information from any sender using this app
6873.quoteText:
Unsubscribe and delete my information from any sender using this app

This action will remove all your information store in our servers.

We will store only your email to identify that if your email goes back to our servers, your information should be removed immediately from any sender using our App.
6873.title: You can delete your content from this service

tosdr.case: You can delete your content from this service

11603.quoteText: 5.4 “Chilliapps” will maintain an information security program (including the adoption and enforcement of internal policies and procedures) against accidental or unlawful loss, access or disclosure. Accordingly, we are committed to identifying reasonably foreseeable and internal risks to security and unauthorized access to the “Chilliapps” services and minimize security risks, including through risk assessment and regular testing.
11603.title: The user is informed about security practices

tosdr.case: The user is informed about security practices

11608.quoteText:
1.1 Minimum Age and Ability to Bind

The Services offered on this Platform are available only to persons or organizations that can form legally binding contracts under applicable law. Persons under the age of 18 are not allowed to use the Services offered on this Platform.
11608.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
